question: From the following, choose the set in which names of Secretary-Generals of the UNO are arranged in correct chronological order?
option1: U Thant, Kurt Waldheim, Dag Hammarskjoeld, Trygve Lie.
option2: Trygve Lie, Dag Hammarskjoeld, U Thant, Kurt Waldheim.
option3: Trygve Lie, U Thant , Dag Hammarskjoeld, Kurt Waldheim.
option4: U Thant, Dag Hammarskjoeld, Trygve Lie, Kurt Waldheim.
answer: Trygve Lie, Dag Hammarskjoeld, U Thant, Kurt Waldheim.
